text: Do you know that foods can make you smarter
by contributing many brain-boosting nutrients?
Hi everyone, today I am partnering up with TH True Nut
to share with you 3 healthy dinner recipes,
good for the heart and soul of the whole family
The TH True Nut collection has 5 flavors:
Almond milk
Nut milk with gac fruit
Macadamia nut milk
Walnut milk
Nut milk and turmeric
I will use Walnut milk for all 3 dinner dishes today
TH True Nut has very mild sweet taste from dates,
without added sugar
almost not sweet
great for those on diet
or diabetes
so we can use it to cook savoury dishes, too
For appetizer I am making Steamed egg custard with walnut milk
Walnut is especially good for the brain development and function
Rich in Omega 3, acid folic
Vitamin E and B6
which help perfect your cognitive ability
Eggs are full of choline, an essential nutrient crucial for healthy memory
Most importantly, the combination of these 2 ingredients makes a super delicious dish,
great for kids and adults alike
The ingredients you need
Firstly, crack 2 eggs in a large bowl
Beat gently till homogenous
Add 2 boxes of TH True Nut
Stir well
Keep the whisk always touching the bottom of the bowl to prevent creating too many bubbles
For seasoning, we'll add
fish sauce
Stock powder and pepper
Divide the mixture into 4 ramekins
Strain through a sieve to get a smooth texture
Cover with lid or alum foil
Bring the water of the steamer to a full boil
Then reduce the heat to very low
before placing the steaming rack with the ramekins on top.
Cover and steam on low for 8-10 minutes
Don't use high heat as it may spoil the silky texture of the custard
thinly slice the shiitake mushroom
Quickly blanch the diced vegetables for 2 minutes with a pinch of salt
Also blanch the shrimps and mushroom and remove.
After 8-10 minutes,
Add the colorful toppings
Then cover and turn off heat. Leave for 5 more minutes
It tastes best freshly steamed.
let me give it a try
It's so soft and silky, melts in your mouth
It smells great of walnut milk
combining the crunchy texture of vegetables
sweet and savoury flavor of shrimp and mushroom
This appetizer will finish in a blink!
The main course for today is hot pot
I call it Erudite Hot Pot
as all of the ingredients are especially good for the brain function and development
like walnut milk, mushroom, salmon, and greens, etc.
Ingredients include
Chop chicken into bite-sized pieces
Combine with minced shallot, fish sauce, stock powder and pepper
Mix well and let sit 15 minutes
Heat some oil in a pot
Add sliced shallot and leek. Fry till fragrant
Add the marinated chicken
Add 1 liter water
Add daikon and corn
and 2-3 slices ginger
Bring to a boil, skim the foam and cook 20 minutes
Score a star on top of the mushroom
Cut tofu into bite-sized cubes
Slice the salmon
and prepare the veggies
When the chicken is tender, add 500ml TH True Nut Walnut milk
It also comes in 1-liter box, very convenient for cooking
Season again to taste with salt and fish sauce
Bring to a boil again and skim off the foam
Arrange all ingredients into the hot pot
Then pour the chicken and walnut milk soup over
You can serve with vermicelli, egg noodle or eat with rice as a soup
The soup is rich, nutty and creamy
very delectable
more delicious than expected
Please give it a try
The dessert cum drink for today's meal is sapote smoothie with walnut milk and chia seeds
Beside the walnut milk,
sapote is also rich in Vitamin B, which helps boosting the brain
chocolate is also a great brain-boosting food
Ingredients you need
Peel and remove the seeds of 4 sapotes
You can use frozen fruits, so the smoothie will be cold without adding extra ice
Add 200ml Walnut milk
break in a chunk of chocolate
Blend away and pour to the glasses to serve
add chia seeds
Sapotes are naturally very sweet, so you don't need to add any sweetener
Tada~  so the dinner is complete
As you see, foods can make you smarter and grow faster
Please add nutritious dishes like these to your everyday meal so the whole family can enjoy
Tag your friends to share these "eat clean" recipes
Thank you everyone. Bye~~
